segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer number of potential accidents is almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: First, there's the sink, just flooding everything without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That water is going to ruin the cabinets and the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the little boy on the stool, about to take a dive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance looks so precarious, it makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, completely oblivious, could slip in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just waiting for the whole situation to explode.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating that no one seems to be addressing these problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The simple act of drying a plate is masking so much danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet immediately!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And get that child off the teetering stool!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene fills me with a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfectly composed tableau of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR
